name: RestaurantBuddyAustin
0:
”Alexa, open Restaurant Buddy Austin and find me a place for a romantic dinner.”
”Can you find me a great restaurant to take a client?”
”Pick me a sports bar with a good selection of beers”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restaurant buddy austin
des:
Are you bored of places around you and ready to discover new places in Austin?

Tired of the same website categorization of places and not finding something that fits your needs?

Are you looking for places for a special occasion, specific characteristic that's not easy to find, or by a particular special dish? 

Look no further! 

Restaurant Buddy is here for you! Ask for places as if you would ask a friend!

With this skill you will be able to discover places, and get the phone number and full address, so you can check it out by yourself. 

Start by asking for a place with a particular feature or food. We will give you our best match, but also make other alternatives available, in case you already know that one. When you find a name that's interesting, say "More Info" to get the details. 

Say "Help" or "Repeat" at any time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
